meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, TX

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes of the October 25, 2023 City Council Meeting
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: Authorize settlement of the lawsuit styled Shakur W. Stewart f/k/a Everold W. Stewart v. John Coughlin and the City of Dallas
agenda_items.description: Settlement not to exceed $900,000.00 from the Liability Reserve Fund.

agenda_items.title: An ordinance authorizing the issuance and sale of City of Dallas, Texas, Equipment Acquisition Contractual Obligations
agenda_items.description: Issuance not to exceed $76,270,000; financing details included.

agenda_items.title: Authorize the Dallas Public Facility Corporation to acquire, develop, and own Maple Highline
agenda_items.description: Mixed-income, multifamily development at 5908 Maple Avenue.

agenda_items.title: A resolution authorizing the conveyance of an easement and right of way to Oncor Electric Delivery Company
agenda_items.description: Easement for power lines across City-owned land.

agenda_items.title: Authorize the rejection of bids for a construction services contract for the Five Mile Infrastructure Improvements Package A
agenda_items.description: Rejection of bids and re-advertisement for new bids.

agenda_items.title: Authorize a construction services contract for the 2024 One-Year Term Agreement for Improved Alley Maintenance Program
agenda_items.description: Contract with B & E Concrete Paving LLC.

agenda_items.title: Authorize a construction services contract for the 2024 Two-Year Term Agreement Slurry Seal and Polymer Modified Micro-Surfacing Contract
Authorize an increase in the construction services contract with The Fain Group, Inc.
agenda_items.description: Increase for additional traffic signal and pedestrian improvements.

agenda_items.title: An ordinance amending Chapter 28, 'Motor Vehicles and Traffic,' of the Dallas City Code
agenda_items.description: Amendments regarding speed regulations and penalties.

financial_items.description: Issuance of Equipment Acquisition Contractual Obligations
Construction services contract for Improved Alley Maintenance Program
Construction services contract for Slurry Seal and Polymer Modified Micro-Surfacing
